entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:08 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:08 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
